title: Conservation of momentum - net external forces

content.question: A box of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> slides across a horizontal surface with initial kinetic energy <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>K</mi></math>. The coefficient of kinetic friction between the box and the surface is <math alttext="mu" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>μ</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions correctly describes the time the box will slide across the surface before coming to rest?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator K, and denominator 2 m, g squared, mu squared, end fraction, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>μ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 2 K, and denominator m g squared, mu squared, end fraction, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>μ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 2 K, and denominator g squared mu squared, end fraction, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>μ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator K, and denominator 2 g squared, mu squared, end fraction, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>K</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>μ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction with numerator 2 K, and denominator m g squared, mu squared, end fraction, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>μ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
